chargeHist.descr: Armed Robbery with Use of Force

result.execSummary:
The defendant Marcius A Lee was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st-Degree Intentional Homicide [Modifiers: Use Dangerous Weapon (Felony 2-5 Yrs), Repeater], a class A felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.01(1)(a).
  • Armed Robbery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).
  • Possession of Firearm by Felon [Modifiers: Repeater], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.  Defendant is not eligible for the Substance Abuse Program. ES to be determined at sentencing for cts 2 & 3.
11/24/15 Crt orders Def is not eligible for ES ever.

superMiscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$250 DNA surcharge remitted. $278  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with family of RF.

supervisions.notes:
Concur to cts  1 & 2.
3/9/16 Crt amends JOC to reflect 490 days of credit for ct 3.

superMiscConds.notes: $268  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 2.
